```{r}
library(tidyverse)
n <- 200 # antal punkter
theta <- seq(0, pi, length.out = n)
cx <- 0 #x-koordinat for origo
cy <- 0 # y-koordinat for origo
r <- 0.8 # radius

x <- cx + r*cos(theta)
y <- cy + r*sin(theta)
df1 <- data.frame(x = x, y = y, group  ="low")

cx <- 0 #x-koordinat for origo
cy <- 2 # y-koordinat for origo
r <- -0.8 # radius

x <- cx + r*cos(theta)
y <- cy + r*sin(theta)
df2 <- data.frame(x = x, y = y, group  ="upp")

df <- bind_rows(df1, df2)
ggplot(df, aes(x, y, fill = group)) +
  geom_polygon() +
   coord_equal() +
  theme_minimal() +
  theme(panel.background = element_rect(fill = "green")
  )
```
